trans-unit.target: Styles

trans-unit.source: Mantenga actualizado el contenido de marketing de su sitio web con los servicios de redifusión de marketing digital de Microsoft.
trans-unit.target: Mantenga actualizado el contenido de marketing de su sitio web con los servicios de redifusión de marketing digital de Microsoft.

trans-unit.source: Use Microsoft marketing syndication to place compelling marketing and product information tied to Microsoft’s global campaigns on your website.
trans-unit.target: Use Microsoft marketing syndication to place compelling marketing and product information tied to Microsoft’s global campaigns on your website.

trans-unit.source: The content is dynamically served, localized, and updated in real time across participating partner sites.
trans-unit.target: The content is dynamically served, localized, and updated in real time across participating partner sites.

trans-unit.source: Syndication is an easy and cost effective way for you to generate leads and drive demand and sales, while ensuring that you always have the latest content on your website.Once you’ve subscribed, changes made to the content are automatically updated on your site, saving you time and effort.In addition, robust partner specific reporting is available to help you measure how the content is being consumed by your customers.
trans-unit.target: Syndication is an easy and cost effective way for you to generate leads and drive demand and sales, while ensuring that you always have the latest content on your website.Once you’ve subscribed, changes made to the content are automatically updated on your site, saving you time and effort.In addition, robust partner specific reporting is available to help you measure how the content is being consumed by your customers.

trans-unit.source: This year we are adding Device Marketing content to Microsoft Digital Commerce and Campaign Network (DCCN) to help you drive demand for the Windows 8 devices you sell.
trans-unit.target: This year we are adding Device Marketing content to Microsoft Digital Commerce and Campaign Network (DCCN) to help you drive demand for the Windows 8 devices you sell.

trans-unit.source: Content is now available in English for Acer, ASUS, Dell, HP, Lenovo, Panasonic, Sony, Samsung, and Toshiba devices, with more coming soon.
trans-unit.target: Content is now available in English for Acer, ASUS, Dell, HP, Lenovo, Panasonic, Sony, Samsung, and Toshiba devices, with more coming soon.

trans-unit.source: Accelerate your sales
trans-unit.target: Accelerate your sales

trans-unit.source: Partners who have participated in marketing syndication have shown 34 percent more revenue (on average) and grew five times faster than partners who did not participate.1
trans-unit.target: Partners who have participated in marketing syndication have shown 34 percent more revenue (on average) and grew five times faster than partners who did not participate.1

trans-unit.source: Worldwide partners can find ready-to-use banners and microsites through the Digital Commerce and Campaign Network (DCCN), along with the latest co-brandable marketing materials to download.
trans-unit.target: Worldwide partners can find ready-to-use banners and microsites through the Digital Commerce and Campaign Network (DCCN), along with the latest co-brandable marketing materials to download.

trans-unit.source: U.S. partners can access marketing content, web banners, and other resources at the OEM Sales Center.
trans-unit.target: U.S. partners can access marketing content, web banners, and other resources at the OEM Sales Center.

trans-unit.source: Syndicate this content to encourage customers to switch to Windows 8 Pro and the new Office.
trans-unit.target: Syndicate this content to encourage customers to switch to Windows 8 Pro and the new Office.

trans-unit.source: Innovation in both Windows 8 Pro PCs and the new Office can help customers with enhanced security, mobility, productivity, and flexibility for their business - great reasons to get modern.

trans-unit.target: Many campaigns have Contact Us or Download Now buttons to generate leads or drive active selling on your website

trans-unit.target: Saved web campaigns enables you to easily update the campaign content on your website with a single click (no need to engage the IT department)

trans-unit.target: Robust web-based reporting so that you can measure impact and ROI

trans-unit.source: If you have experienced any one of the following, you may be eligible to receive replacement media:
trans-unit.target: If you have experienced any one of the following, you may be eligible to receive replacement media:

trans-unit.source: CD(s) received will not properly install
trans-unit.target: CD(s) received will not properly install

trans-unit.source: CD(s) noticeably damaged on receipt
trans-unit.target: CD(s) noticeably damaged on receipt

trans-unit.source: CD(s) damaged during preinstallation process
trans-unit.target: CD(s) damaged during preinstallation process

trans-unit.source: Based on your feedback, this program has been designed to:
trans-unit.target: Based on your feedback, this program has been designed to:

trans-unit.source: Eliminate the need for system builders to contact distributors for replacement media, and instead enable fulfillment directly from Microsoft.
trans-unit.target: Eliminate the need for system builders to contact distributors for replacement media, and instead enable fulfillment directly from Microsoft.

trans-unit.source: Simplify and streamline the replacement process and eliminate the cost to system builders.
trans-unit.target: Simplify and streamline the replacement process and eliminate the cost to system builders.

trans-unit.source: Media replacement is available to system builders in all countries worldwide, with the exception of China.
trans-unit.target: Media replacement is available to system builders in all countries worldwide, with the exception of China.

trans-unit.source: The following OEM software versions are supported for replacement under this program:
trans-unit.target: The following OEM software versions are supported for replacement under this program:

trans-unit.source: Windows 8 Pro
trans-unit.target: Windows 8 Pro

trans-unit.source: Windows 8 Standard
trans-unit.target: Windows 8 Standard

trans-unit.source: Windows 7 - Professional, Home Basic, Home Premium, Ultimate
trans-unit.target: Windows 7 - Professional, Home Basic, Home Premium, Ultimate

trans-unit.source: Windows Home Server
trans-unit.target: Windows Home Server

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2008 - Standard, Enterprise, Datacenter
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2008 - Standard, Enterprise, Datacenter

trans-unit.source: Windows Small Business Server 2011 Essentials
trans-unit.target: Windows Small Business Server 2011 Essentials

trans-unit.source: Windows Small Business Server 2011 Premium Add On
trans-unit.target: Windows Small Business Server 2011 Premium Add On

trans-unit.source: Windows Small Business Server 2008 - Standard and Premium
trans-unit.target: Windows Small Business Server 2008 - Standard and Premium

trans-unit.source: Windows Server for Windows Essential Server 2008
trans-unit.target: Windows Server for Windows Essential Server 2008

trans-unit.source: Windows HPC Server 2008
trans-unit.target: Windows HPC Server 2008

trans-unit.source: HPC Pack 2008
trans-unit.target: HPC Pack 2008

trans-unit.source: Windows SQL Server 2008 for Small Business
trans-unit.target: Windows SQL Server 2008 for Small Business

trans-unit.source: System Center Data Protection Manager Server 2007 - Standard and Enterprise
trans-unit.target: System Center Data Protection Manager Server 2007 - Standard and Enterprise

trans-unit.target: Windows 8 SL (Single language)

trans-unit.source: Media Replacement Ordering Instructions
trans-unit.target: Media Replacement Ordering Instructions

trans-unit.source: If you are a system builder and would like to request replacement media listed above, please click on and complete the Media Replacement Form below.
trans-unit.target: If you are a system builder and would like to request replacement media listed above, please click on and complete the Media Replacement Form below.

trans-unit.source: Once you have provided the required information, including Certificate of Authenticity (COA) details, a submission confirmation message will be sent to you via email.
trans-unit.target: Once you have provided the required information, including Certificate of Authenticity (COA) details, a submission confirmation message will be sent to you via email.

trans-unit.source: Please click here to access the Media Replacement Form.
trans-unit.target: Please click here to access the Media Replacement Form.

trans-unit.source: OEM System Builder Media Replacement
trans-unit.target: OEM System Builder Media Replacement

trans-unit.source: System builders:
trans-unit.target: System builders:

trans-unit.source: Media fulfillment for the 2007 Microsoft Office OPK is no longer available.
trans-unit.target: Media fulfillment for the 2007 Microsoft Office OPK is no longer available.

trans-unit.source: Learn which OEM software versions are supported for replacement.
trans-unit.target: Learn which OEM software versions are supported for replacement.

trans-unit.source: Have you received damaged Microsoft OEM System Builder software media?
trans-unit.target: Have you received damaged Microsoft OEM System Builder software media?

trans-unit.source: Or, have you damaged your media during preinstallation?
trans-unit.target: Or, have you damaged your media during preinstallation?

trans-unit.source: If you have, you may request replacement media online, provided you have a valid Certificate of Authenticity (COA).
trans-unit.target: If you have, you may request replacement media online, provided you have a valid Certificate of Authenticity (COA).

trans-unit.source: System builders:
trans-unit.target: System builders:

trans-unit.source: Learn how to download or order the 2007 Microsoft Office OPK Master Kit, either from Microsoft or from an authorized distributor.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to download or order the 2007 Microsoft Office OPK Master Kit, either from Microsoft or from an authorized distributor.

trans-unit.source: Also find out how to place an online order for replacements for damaged OEM System Builder software media.
trans-unit.target: Also find out how to place an online order for replacements for damaged OEM System Builder software media.

trans-unit.source: Styles
trans-unit.target: Styles

trans-unit.source: Explore Your Options
trans-unit.target: Explore Your Options

trans-unit.source: With the ROK software distribution model, you get convenience and flexibility.
trans-unit.target: With the ROK software distribution model, you get convenience and flexibility.

trans-unit.source: Purchasing Convenience and Flexibility
trans-unit.target: Purchasing Convenience and Flexibility

trans-unit.source: ROK is a fast and easy way to purchase server products—like RAM, hard drives, or processors—from your OEM distributor.
trans-unit.target: ROK is a fast and easy way to purchase server products—like RAM, hard drives, or processors—from your OEM distributor.

trans-unit.source: You buy the installation-ready software kit as another server option using one price list.
trans-unit.target: You buy the installation-ready software kit as another server option using one price list.

trans-unit.source: Fast and Easy Deployment
trans-unit.target: Fast and Easy Deployment

trans-unit.source: You get software that is tested, tuned, and certified with OEM-branded hardware, and is packaged with the latest drivers and customized installation tools for fast and easy deployment.
trans-unit.target: You get software that is tested, tuned, and certified with OEM-branded hardware, and is packaged with the latest drivers and customized installation tools for fast and easy deployment.

trans-unit.source: How Are ROKs Sold?
trans-unit.target: How Are ROKs Sold?

trans-unit.source: Resellers purchase the OEM-branded server and Microsoft Windows Server ROK software through an authorized distributor.
trans-unit.target: Resellers purchase the OEM-branded server and Microsoft Windows Server ROK software through an authorized distributor.

trans-unit.source: The reseller has the flexibility to purchase the server hardware and software together or separately.
trans-unit.target: The reseller has the flexibility to purchase the server hardware and software together or separately.

trans-unit.source: The distributor ships the ROK in the box with the server or separately (the distributor may also preinstall the software for a fee).
trans-unit.target: The distributor ships the ROK in the box with the server or separately (the distributor may also preinstall the software for a fee).

trans-unit.source: The reseller installs the operating system and the Windows COA before delivering the new server to the end user.
trans-unit.target: The reseller installs the operating system and the Windows COA before delivering the new server to the end user.

trans-unit.source: Reseller Option Kits are available for:
trans-unit.target: Reseller Option Kits are available for:

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2012 R2 Datacenter
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2012 R2 Datacenter

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2012 R2 Standard
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2012 R2 Standard

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2012 R2 Essentials
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2012 R2 Essentials

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2012 R2 Foundation
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2012 R2 Foundation

trans-unit.source: Windows Storage Server 2012 R2 Standard
trans-unit.target: Windows Storage Server 2012 R2 Standard

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2012 Datacenter
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2012 Datacenter

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2012 Essentials

trans-unit.source: Reseller Option Kits for Servers
trans-unit.target: Reseller Option Kits for Servers

trans-unit.source: The Reseller Option Kit (ROK) is a software distribution option that enables you to order tuned and certified Microsoft server software separately from OEM servers.
trans-unit.target: The Reseller Option Kit (ROK) is a software distribution option that enables you to order tuned and certified Microsoft server software separately from OEM servers.

trans-unit.source: The Reseller Option Kit (ROK) is a software distribution option that enables you to order tuned and certified Microsoft server software separately from OEM servers so that you have more flexibility to deliver customized server solutions.
trans-unit.target: The Reseller Option Kit (ROK) is a software distribution option that enables you to order tuned and certified Microsoft server software separately from OEM servers so that you have more flexibility to deliver customized server solutions.

trans-unit.source: Each ROK is another server option—like memory or hard drives—that you specify when you order servers.
trans-unit.target: Each ROK is another server option—like memory or hard drives—that you specify when you order servers.

trans-unit.source: You can install the appropriate ROK on your customer’s preferred server model to address any combination of hardware and software.
trans-unit.target: You can install the appropriate ROK on your customer’s preferred server model to address any combination of hardware and software.

trans-unit.source: Your customers still enjoy the same great performance of OEM-tuned drivers for Microsoft software, because each ROK is carefully matched to a specific server brand.​​​​​​​​​​​​
trans-unit.target: Your customers still enjoy the same great performance of OEM-tuned drivers for Microsoft software, because each ROK is carefully matched to a specific server brand.​​​​​​​​​​​​

trans-unit.source: The Reseller Option Kit (ROK) is a software distribution option that enables you to order tuned and certified Microsoft server software separately from OEM servers so that you have more flexibility to deliver customized server solutions.
trans-unit.target: The Reseller Option Kit (ROK) is a software distribution option that enables you to order tuned and certified Microsoft server software separately from OEM servers so that you have more flexibility to deliver customized server solutions.
